column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I wanted to take a trip to Washington DC to visit the monuments .
#id=2
#text=The quickest and cheapest way seemed to be by train .
#id=3
#text=I purchased a ticket online and had a friend drop me at the station .
#id=4
#text=Once at the station I gave my ticket to the agent .
#id=5
#text=Then I went and sat in the lobby to wait for it to arrive .
#id=6
#text=Once the train arrived I boarded and took my seat next to a window .
#id=7
#text=The ride would take a few hours so I settled in with a book .
#id=8
#text=I enjoyed watching the countryside pass when I got bored with the book .
#id=9
#text=When I went to the bathroom I could n't get the door to bolt shut all the way .
#text=the train braked and the door slid open and I had to stand to re-shut it .
#text=A passenger next to the restroom saw my butt .
#text=It was embarrasing and I did n't leave my seat for the rest of the ride until we got to DC .
